title: How much time does it require to get a Canadian PR visa after applying as a married couple? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello there, Based on my previous cases, it can take between one to three years. Best Regards, Jubin Ahdi, BSc, RCIC Commissioner for Taking Affidavits Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant - R526521 Canadian Association of Professional Immigration Consultants - R16848
